history.content: Hi Everyone, We hope the semester is going well. Happy Thanksgiving week coming up! Due to the Holiday our Virtual Drop in Advising will be offered 10am -12 Noon on Wed 11/24. https://eecs.berkeley.edu/resources/undergrads/cs/advising *Please note too that many questions can be answered via email: cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu We can also review and sign documents such as double major forms and even go over program plans etc via email too. We have found some students waiting over a week for an appointment and needing just a one line answer. We aim for prompt responses. Also this is the contact info for speaking to L&S about their requirements. They can answer questions about breadth requirements, unit count and L&S policy in general. Graduating seniors should also speak to L&S to verify graduation requirements met: https://lsadvising.berkeley.edu/appointments-advice email: asklns@berkeley.edu Questions? Send any and all to: cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu
history.subject: Wed 11/24 Virtual Advising Drop in Hours shifted to 10am -12 Noon
